alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Colleton; Hampton; Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 11 at 1:24PM EDT until August 11 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT...HAMPTON...COLLETON AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 124 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Islandton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Walterboro, Hampton, Yemassee, Lake Warren State Park, Varnville, Crocketville, Miley, Hendersonville, Islandton, Early Branch, Cummings, McPhersonville, Almeda Intersection, and White Hall. This warning includes I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 37 and 60. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
